html: 6/8: Addressing this crisis isn’t “anti-immigrant” or xenophobic. A generous immigration system must be an orderly one. But what we have now is border chaos. It is diverting resources from other needs & making it impossible to deal with other aspects of immigration reform.
text:
6/8: Addressing this crisis isn’t “anti-immigrant” or xenophobic. A generous immigration system must be an orderly one. 

But what we have now is border chaos. It is diverting resources from other needs & making it impossible to deal with other aspects of immigration reform.

html: 4/8: To fix this is for Congress to act: 1. Fix asy­lum loop­holes. Make clear that only those facing persecution are eligible for asylum; 2. Overturn 9th circuit rulings that expanded the Flores agreement 3. Expedite pending hearing by providing more $ judges & housing
text:
4/8: To fix this is for Congress to act:
1. Fix asy­lum loop­holes. Make clear that only those facing persecution are eligible for asylum; 
2. Overturn 9th circuit rulings that expanded the Flores agreement
3. Expedite pending hearing by providing more $ judges & housing

The @FloridaChiefs have endorsed my bipartisan Threat Assessment,Prevention & Safety Act (TAPS). This bill will develop guidelines to help identify potential mass shooters & stop them before they act. 

Thank you for your support.

#Sayfie
